languages.text: {n}Девушка едва заметно кривится и поправляет украшение посреди лба, а затем смущенно скрывает когтистые пальцы в складках одежд. Необычный облик навигаторов часто становится предметом сплетен как среди низших слуг, так и среди офицеров. Неудивительно, что Кассия предпочитает компанию того, кто уже привык к ее внешнему виду.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Девушка едва заметно кривится и поправляет украшение посреди лба, а затем смущенно скрывает когтистые пальцы в складках одежд. Необычный облик Навигаторов часто становится предметом сплетен как среди низших слуг, так и среди офицеров. Неудивительно, что Кассия предпочитает компанию того, кто уже привык к ее внешнему виду.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia cringes ever so slightly, adjusts the adornment on her forehead, then awkwardly hides her clawed fingers in the folds of her clothes. The unnatural appearance of Navigators often becomes the topic of gossip among lowly servants and officers alike. It is unsurprising, then, that Cassia prefers the company of one who is used to how she looks.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Девушка едва заметно кривится и поправляет украшение посреди лба, а затем смущенно скрывает когтистые пальцы в складках одежд. languages.text: {n}Cassia verzieht ganz leicht das Gesicht, richtet sich den Schmuck auf ihrer Stirn und verbirgt dann ihre klauenbewehrten Finger in den Falten ihrer Kleidung. Das unnatürliche Aussehen von Navigatoren wird oft zum Gesprächsthema tratschender Diener und Offiziere. Da überrascht es nicht, dass Cassia die Gesellschaft eines Dieners vorzieht, der ihr Aussehen gewohnt ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia cringes ever so slightly, adjusts the adornment on her forehead, then awkwardly hides her clawed fingers in the folds of her clothes. The unnatural appearance of Navigators often becomes the topic of gossip among lowly servants and officers alike. It is unsurprising, then, that Cassia prefers the company of one who is used to how she looks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia verzieht ganz leicht das Gesicht, richtet sich den Schmuck auf ihrer Stirn und verbirgt dann ihre klauenbewehrten Finger in den Falten ihrer Kleidung. Das ungewöhnliche Aussehen von Navigatoren wird oft zum Gesprächsthema tratschender Diener und Offiziere. Da überrascht es nicht, dass Cassia die Gesellschaft eines Dieners vorzieht, der ihr Aussehen gewohnt ist.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia tressaille légèrement, ajuste l'ornement sur son front, puis cache maladroitement ses doigts griffus dans les plis de ses habits. L'apparence surnaturelle des navigateurs fait souvent l'objet de ragots parmi les officiers et les serviteurs du bas peuple. Il n'est donc pas surprenant que Cassia privilégie la compagnie d'une personne habituée à son aspect.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia cringes ever so slightly, adjusts the adornment on her forehead, then awkwardly hides her clawed fingers in the folds of her clothes. The unnatural appearance of Navigators often becomes the topic of gossip among lowly servants and officers alike. It is unsurprising, then, that Cassia prefers the company of one who is used to how she looks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia tressaille légèrement, ajuste l'ornement sur son front, puis cache maladroitement ses doigts griffus dans les plis de ses habits. L'apparence inhabituelle des navigateurs fait souvent l'objet de ragots parmi les officiers et les serviteurs du bas peuple. Il n'est donc pas surprenant que Cassia privilégie la compagnie d'une personne habituée à son aspect.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅微微瑟缩起身子，摸了摸额头上的装饰品，随后笨拙地将锋利的指尖藏进衣物的重重皱褶中。导航者由于异于常人的外貌，常常会成为底层仆佣与军官茶余饭后的谈资。因此，卡西娅愿意让这位早已习惯她外貌的仆人作伴，也就不足为奇了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia cringes ever so slightly, adjusts the adornment on her forehead, then awkwardly hides her clawed fingers in the folds of her clothes. The unnatural appearance of Navigators often becomes the topic of gossip among lowly servants and officers alike. It is unsurprising, then, that Cassia prefers the company of one who is used to how she looks.{/n}

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアはわずかに尻込みし、額の装飾を整えると、爪のついた指をおずおずと衣装のひだの中にしまう。航宙士の外見は不自然なので、下位の使用人や士官の間でうわさ話にのぼることが非常に多い。カシアが彼女の外見に慣れた仲間を好むのは、驚くべきことではない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia cringes ever so slightly, adjusts the adornment on her forehead, then awkwardly hides her clawed fingers in the folds of her clothes. The unnatural appearance of Navigators often becomes the topic of gossip among lowly servants and officers alike. It is unsurprising, then, that Cassia prefers the company of one who is used to how she looks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアはわずかに尻込みし、額の装飾を整えると、爪のついた指をおずおずと衣装のひだの中にしまう。航宙士の外見は不自然なので、下位の使用人や士官の間でうわさ話にのぼることが非常に多い。カシアが彼女の外見に慣れた仲間を好むのは、驚くべきことではない。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia siente vergüenza, se ajusta el adorno de la frente y luego esconde torpemente los dedos con garras entre los pliegues de su ropa. El antinatural aspecto de los navegantes se convierte a menudo en tema de cotilleo tanto entre humildes sirvientes como entre oficiales. No es de extrañar pues que Cassia prefiera la compañía de alguien acostumbrado a su aspecto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia cringes ever so slightly, adjusts the adornment on her forehead, then awkwardly hides her clawed fingers in the folds of her clothes. The unnatural appearance of Navigators often becomes the topic of gossip among lowly servants and officers alike. It is unsurprising, then, that Cassia prefers the company of one who is used to how she looks.{/n}

No es de extrañar pues que Cassia prefiera la compañía de alguien acostumbrado a su aspecto.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia, olduğu yere hafiften siniyor. Alnındaki süsü düzeltiyor. Sonra da uzun tırnaklı parmaklarını beceriksizce kıyafetinin katları arasına gizliyor. Rotacılar, sıra dışı görünüşleri dolayısıyla sık sık avam hizmetkârların, subayların dedikodu malzemesi olabiliyor. Hâl böyle olunca Cassia'nın da görünüşüne alışkın olan biriyle vakit geçirmeyi istemesi gayet anlaşılır.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia cringes ever so slightly, adjusts the adornment on her forehead, then awkwardly hides her clawed fingers in the folds of her clothes. The unnatural appearance of Navigators often becomes the topic of gossip among lowly servants and officers alike. It is unsurprising, then, that Cassia prefers the company of one who is used to how she looks.{/n}
